body:
Looks like it's been flaking on more than just PPC:

`$ greplogs -dashboard -e TestInterruptWithPanic_h2 -e INTERNAL_ERROR -l -md`
[2016-04-19T22:04:30-8b20fd0/freebsd-arm-paulzhol](https://build.golang.org/log/9d3f48e0fe2f0dfec444f5d084d90f0bc8fa86ff)
[2016-05-03T00:49:46-499cd33/freebsd-arm-paulzhol](https://build.golang.org/log/53424b22dbd12b871f1e170d86d35de3a7511d12)
[2016-05-06T16:43:51-c81a353/darwin-386-10_10](https://build.golang.org/log/6427c7946ca0d9770e4ff54c8986eb8a901a4fcd)
[2016-05-10T03:55:12-3d82432/linux-amd64-race](https://build.golang.org/log/c06ddfed924950377bc7764cd5276345965113a8)
[2016-05-18T14:18:48-b30fcbc/linux-ppc64le-buildlet](https://build.golang.org/log/413ed0f823134ef78a27e7cd7b10fb38182cc31e)
[2016-06-24T02:21:02-f9d6b90/freebsd-arm-paulzhol](https://build.golang.org/log/30a5284201a6f93045f65da332fcf2d60c03b66e)
[2016-08-09T00:43:25-392bf3a/darwin-amd64-10_9](https://build.golang.org/log/8ba62801109ba87c2cb6464d74fc0ab5b4926bce)
[2016-08-17T23:23:28-6937167/darwin-amd64-10_9](https://build.golang.org/log/9f9d561a669bc9a2f62e2b3d290785d143f87360)
[2016-08-23T14:53:47-03723c9/darwin-amd64-10_8](https://build.golang.org/log/7bb40c090d03cc6327c237a735267a674cd15f4b)
[2016-09-14T16:39:47-2e67514/android-arm64-sdk21](https://build.golang.org/log/a0baa66b59f9159d48f434037bd7e25b9faf09f3)
[2016-09-17T00:34:19-a1bf203/linux-ppc64le-buildlet](https://build.golang.org/log/512a378cc11774b203aa0962c9818326eda0cd76)
[2016-09-25T02:38:11-890c09e/linux-ppc64le-buildlet](https://build.golang.org/log/ae7a7294c3d83cc5584aabeec8bb4fe55b9e4832)
[2016-09-26T22:01:32-d211c2d/linux-ppc64le-buildlet](https://build.golang.org/log/969151e16737eda8c8720b1c0c3cb6f0ddbe5025)

Flake analysis isn't very helpful with this one, I'm afraid:

```
$ greplogs -dashboard -e TestInterruptWithPanic_h2 -e INTERNAL_ERROR -l | findflakes -paths
First observed 8b20fd0 19 Apr 22:04 2016 (1668 commits ago)
Last observed  d211c2d 26 Sep 22:01 2016 (88 commits ago)
51% chance failure is still happening
0.76% failure probability (13 of 1581 commits)
Likely culprits:
    1% 8b20fd0 cmd/compile: transform some Phis into Or8.
    1% 082f464 go/types: trailing semis are ok after valid fallthrough
    1% a4dd6ea runtime: add maxSliceCap
    1% 55ab07c cmd/compile: static composite literals are side-effect free
    1% 3c6e60c cmd/compile: fix isStaticCompositeLiteral
    1% 562d398 go/types: accept trailing empty stmts in terminating stmt lists
    1% 9b6bf20 crypto/aes: de-couple asm and go implementations
    1% 03e216f cmd/compile: re-enable in-place append optimization
    1% b5ddbb9 spec: refine rules about terminating statements
    1% a39950b crypto/aes: delete TestEncryptBlock and TestDecryptBlock
No known past failures
```
